comment:
Recht karamellige Nase, eher dünnes Gefühl im Mund, mittlerer Brand; gut, aber nicht erinnerungswürdig.

Wien - 06/20

This review is of the 12 year Highland Queen Majesty single malt.

Nose: Very mellow nose, hardly anything notcieable

Taste: Barley, cereal grains, very watery and light, but slightly sweet.  Possibly the smoothest and most boring spirit I've ever had.  Not particularly exciting or enjoyable.
